Find your way around Nagios and Pingdom

Instructions

Create a step-by-step guide:

  1. Sign in to Nagios

  2. Enter the domain as ab1234 at hostname next to the magnifying glass and hit enter to find

  3. click on the hostname to see the options

  4. For now only the options “Disable notifications for all services on this host” and “Enable notifications for all services on this host”

  5. Check the action and check the box “Enable For Host Too” and Confirm

  6. Then on the next page don’t click done. Done clears the searchbar.
    Instead go to the search bar and hit enter again to go back to the installation. If the notifications are disabled, the Installation has crossed out speakers next to the monitoring checks.
